sn1.46:1.1: “It’s resounding with a group of nymphs,
sn1.46:1.2: but haunted by a gang of goblins!
sn1.46:1.4: How am I supposed to live like this?”
sn1.46:2.2: and it’s headed for the place called ‘fearless’.
sn1.46:2.4: fitted with wheels of skillful thoughts.
sn1.46:3.3: I say the teaching is the driver,
sn1.46:3.4: with right view running out in front.
